dcterms:creator: L.A. Shepp
B.F. Logan
dcterms:description: The Shepp-Logan Phantom is a mathematical model used for testing image reconstruction algorithms, particularly in the field of computed tomography.
dcterms:title: Shepp-Logan Phantom

dcterms:creator: C. Syben
B. Stimpel
K. Breininger
T. Wülf
R. Fahrig
A. Dörfler
A. Maier
dcterms:description: Numerical phantoms used for training the neural network, consisting of various shapes and noise characteristics to simulate different imaging scenarios.
dcterms:title: Numerical Phantoms

dcterms:creator: C. Syben
B. Stimpel
M. Leghissa
A. Dörfler
A. Maier
dcterms:description: MR Projection Imaging dataset used for acquiring fan-beam projection images from MRI data, facilitating the study of hybrid imaging techniques.
dcterms:title: MR Projection Imaging

dcterms:creator: C. Syben
B. Stimpel
M. Leghissa
A. Dörfler
A. Maier
dcterms:description: Simulation data generated for evaluating the proposed methods in the context of fan-beam projection image acquisition using MRI.
dcterms:title: Simulation Data
